text: 34:4 2 Atriviba 21:3; 2 Eghaghaniba 33:3A ghua garima, ingangarir gumaziba asem Balɨn ofa gamir dakozibagh asɨghasɨgha, dar boroghɨn itir paura mughuriar aghuimɨn ofabagh amir dakozibagh asɨghasɨki. Egha me temer guarir aser amizim Aseran nedazim itiba ko, temeba ko, ainɨn ingarizir aser mabar nedaziba sara asɨghasɨgha, dav sozima da mɨsaraghira averenimɨn mɨn oto. Egha me averenir kaba inigha ghua gumazamizir fomɨra aser kabar ofa gamizibar mozibagh isɨn da kavamangi.
